MajorClaims.MC1: I disagree with the opinion that children who are brought up in less well-of families are, likely, more successful in the future life

Claims.C1: children from poorer families are prone to have bad habits such as: crime, thievery and thuggery
Claims.C2: wealthy families can afford better health services and costly medicines, which will be very beneficial for the health of a child
Claims.C3: people who are born in well-off families have access to good education, which will have a positive impact on their later life
Claims.C4: children from rich families have better skills on how to use money

Premises.P1: these people will not have an access to a good education
Premises.P2: they can be proselytized into bad isms
Premises.P3: most of the terroristic groups try to attract uneducated people
Premises.P4: the person with better education has a wider outlook, which will allow no brainwash
Premises.P5: people with lower level of education have more proneness to be attracted in such isms
Premises.P6: they use it a lot of times
Premises.P7: many good medicines cost vast amounts of money, which cannot be afforded by poorer families
